data.comment: Savio Pereira Sampaio starts the match. Vasco da Gama with the kick-off in Rio de Janeiro.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
In the minute 2, Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Gremio.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
In Rio de Janeiro Gremio drive forward through Alisson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 6, Gremio have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Alisson (Gremio) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
In the minute 9, Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Gremio a goal kick.
Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
Gremio are pushing forward but Matheus Henrique's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 11, It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Gremio throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
In the minute 13, Pepe (Gremio) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Henrique Silva (Vasco da Gama) has received a yellow card from Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 15, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Gremio territory.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 16, Vasco da Gama are coming forward and Ricardo Graca gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Gremio have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Vasco da Gama is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 21, Gremio to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Gremio.
Gremio's Luis Orejuela misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 23, Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gremio's half?
In the minute 24, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Gremio's half.
Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Gremio at São Januario.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama close to the penalty box.
Bruno Gomes for Vasco da Gama gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Gremio territory.
Throw-in Gremio.
In the minute 32, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Rio de Janeiro to check on Matheus Henrique, who is grimacing with pain.
Matheus Henrique has recovered and rejoins the match in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 34, Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Gremio in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 36, Goal kick for Gremio at São Januario.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Vasco da Gama's Martin Benitez has been booked in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 38, Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio waits before resuming play because Fernando Miguel for Vasco da Gama is still down.
In the minute 43, Free kick Gremio.
Fernando Miguel is back on the pitch.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Lucas Silva of Gremio gets in a strike, but is off target.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
In the minute 45, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Gremio.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Gremio.
Andrey is back on his feet again.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Savio Pereira Sampaio blows to end the first-half.
Andrey is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 45, Matheus Henrique is booked for the away team.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Gremio kick-off.
In the minute 46, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Gremio.
The home team replace Claudio Winck with Cayo Tenorio.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 48, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Vasco da Gama close to the penalty box.
In the minute 51, Talles Magno of Vasco da Gama gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 55, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a throw-in for Gremio, close to Vasco da Gama's area.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 57, Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Gremio.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
In the minute 60, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Gremio's half.
In the minute 60, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Gremio.
Bruno Cesar is on a sub for Fellipe Bastos for Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Vasco da Gama's Ricardo Graca misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 62, Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Gremio a goal kick.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
Gremio make their first substitution with Thiago Neves replacing Jean Pyerre.
In the minute 64, Gremio have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 67, Gremio to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
German Cano for Vasco da Gama is whistled offside.
In the minute 69, Paulo Victor is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Paulo Victor returns to the field for Gremio after picking up a slight injury.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Gremio.
In the minute 72, Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 74, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
At São Januario, Cayo Tenorio has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Vinicius is replacing Martin Benitez for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
In the minute 75, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Gremio throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
In the minute 76, Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Renato Gaucho (Gremio) is making a second substitution, with Everton replacing Alisson.
Thaciano is replacing Isaque for the away team.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 78, Free kick Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Gremio.
In the minute 80, Vasco da Gama are coming forward and Vinicius gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Gremio.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Thaciano for Gremio has been booked by Savio Pereira Sampaio and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Rio de Janeiro Gremio attack through Everton. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 84, Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Gremio.
Free kick for Gremio in the half of Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 87, Vasco da Gama's Andrey has been booked in Rio de Janeiro and will miss the next match through suspension.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Guilherme Azevedo is replacing Pepe for the away team.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 89, Ramon Menezes is making the team's fourth substitution at São Januario with Ribamar replacing German Cano.
Free kick Gremio.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Free kick Gremio.
Andrey gets his shot on target but fails to score for Vasco da Gama.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-0.
Ribamar for Vasco da Gama has been booked by Savio Pereira Sampaio and receives a first yellow card.
